changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.location_product_access_authorization AS SELECT a.id, l.name AS location, ptr.name AS location_relationship, r.name AS relationship, p.name AS product, ctr.name AS product_relationship FROM ruleform.access_authorization a JOIN ruleform.location l ON a.location1 = l.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ptr ON a.parent_transitive_relationship = ptr.id JOIN ruleform.relationship r ON a.relationship = r.id JOIN ruleform.product p ON a.product2 = p.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ctr ON a.child_transitive_relationship = ctr.id WHERE a.authorization_type = '5';
ALTER TABLE readable.location_product_access_authorization OWNER TO core;
